summary: "Leave It to Beaver" is an old American TV show about a boy named Beaver, his family, and friends. It first aired in 1957 on CBS, then moved to ABC where it ran for five more years. Despite not being very popular when it first aired, it became a hit later as reruns. The show starred Barbara Billingsley and was produced by different companies over the years. It also inspired a movie in 1997, though it wasn't very successful.
title: Leave It to Beaver
